NG0220:3179: kha sbyor 'khor lo thod pa ga bur gzhug / nyin mtshan dril gtor ming bcas spu gri sbyar //
NG0220:3180: thod pa'i gseb tu thun gyi spu gri dgod //
NG0220:3181: ri rgyal rbab dang gser gyi dgu thog ltar //
NG0220:3182: sbrul gyi gseb tu gnan pa'i spu gri dgod //
NG0220:3183: gser gyi sa gzhi ri rab brtan ltar bzlas //
NG0220:3184: gru gsum nang du brnag pa'i rten rnams bzhag / mthing nag kha bcad gsad pa'i sbyor ba brtsam //
NG0220:3185: brgyad dam bcu gnyis dril gtor drag sngags bzlas //
NG0220:3186: sbyor ba thon nas thod pa gzir zhing bca' //
NG0220:3187: ri rab pho brang gdug pa'i klu la gtad //
NG0220:3188: nya stong kha gso thod khrag dug bza' 'phang *//
NG0220:3189: drag po sngags kyi dmod pa 'di lta ste //
NG0220:3190: e ka he dun ya ma rag sha ma dza mun tri /
NG0220:3193: dgra bo'i srog la nr-i sha trum ma ra ya rbad /
NG0220:3195: srog la nr-i shag rbad yam thun b+h+yo /
NG0220:3196: me rlung sbyor ba las kyi mchog / rnal mas gsad pa'i sbyor ba yin //
NG0220:3197: drag sngags mngon du phyur ba'i rgyud las /
NG0220:3198: rtsa ba'i sbyor ba'i le'u ste bcu drug pa'o //  // gzhan yang gsad pa'i sbyor ba ni //
NG0220:3199: ma grub spogs na lto dkrug bca' //
NG0220:3200: ras la thig skor bzhi ru bskor //
NG0220:3201: gru gsum zla kham ming rus lha //
NG0220:3202: 'khrul mig bcu drug rtsa ba'i sngags //
NG0220:3203: yang legs bcu drug spu gri mtshon //
NG0220:3204: tha ma sbrul bzhi'i ra bas bskor //
NG0220:3205: gcod cing gnon pa'i 'khor lo yin //
NG0220:3206: bla sems 'chang ba drag po'i gnas //
NG0220:3207: gdug pa sreg byed las kyi me //
NG0220:3209: srog dbugs 'chad pa gshed gsang mdzod //
NG0220:3210: rtsa gcod dbugs bral mtshon chen dug / srog dang las sdud ze yi lcags //
NG0220:3211: dbang po gnon pa ri bo'i rbab //
NG0220:3212: las sbyangs shes smin phyag rgya brtan //
NG0220:3213: gdug pa'i mtshon cha ngar blud la //
NG0220:3214: drag sngags lto dkrug khri brgyad gnyis //
NG0220:3215: mtshan mo bskul gyin dril ba'i sngags //
NG0220:3216: thon nas thod mkhar gdug pas gdab //
NG0220:3217: thun khrag dug gzer kha gso bskyed //
NG0220:3218: shes pa'i khyad par gsum ldan 'phang *//
NG0220:3219: dbang po rno myur gsal 'phro sdud //
NG0220:3220: gdeng gsum sngags skong rgyas par bgrod //
NG0220:3221: drag sngags sbyor ba 'di lta ste //
NG0220:3222: e ka he dun rag sha ya ma tsa dza shu tri sham mug tri snying */
NG0220:3223: dgra bo'i srog la yongs thums shig rbad /
NG0220:3225: srog khyer yam shig hri thums myog thun b+h+yo /
NG0220:3226: gzhan yang las kyi rim pa ni //
NG0220:3227: sprul pas lo thog gzhom pa las //
NG0220:3228: dur khrod ras sam shog bu la //
NG0220:3229: thig skor rim pa gsum du bskor //
NG0220:3230: dbus su gru gsum yul gyi ming *//
NG0220:3231: zla gam sbyor ba gzhom pa bri //
NG0220:3232: phyi rim 'khrul mig bcu drug la //
NG0220:3233: rtsa ba'i drag sngags rnal ma bkod //
NG0220:3234: tha ma rtsib chen nyi shu la //
NG0220:3235: dbab pa'i spu gri drag po dgod //
NG0220:3236: rus sbal lto bar sbyor ba bsdu //
NG0220:3237: kha sbyor thod pa zhabs mas gril //
NG0220:3238: khrag sna dug sna sngo na brdeb //
NG0220:3239: sprul pa'i bsgom gyin bskul la bzlas //
NG0220:3240: sbyor ba thon nas gta' ma gzhug / drag sngags stong du rgyun mi gcad //
NG0220:3241: ston zla gsum du dbab pa brtsam //
NG0220:3242: zor dang du ba thab dang gzir //
NG0220:3243: khrag dang dug rdzas sngo sna dug / lcags phur drag sngags khri bzhir ldan //
NG0220:3244: gdug pa'i rten dang gzugs la brdeg / dregs pa kun gyi mthu dril ba'i //
NG0220:3245: sngags kyi rgyal po 'di lta ste //
NG0220:3246: e ka he dun yam yam sham dz+wa mun tri
NG0220:3247: sham ram kring shu snying phroms phroms shar shar na
NG0220:3248: ga hur nan phrom phrom shar shar hril hril drag
NG0220:3249: tu phob phrom na ga dza yam snying gzir tsi
NG0220:3250: ta nan phrom / shar shar hril b+h+yo /
NG0220:3251: lo thog gzhom pa drag po'i las //
NG0220:3252: thod pa stobs dang ldan pa'o //
NG0220:3253: gzhan yang sprul pa'i tshe bdag gis //
NG0220:3256: thams cad gcig tu dril ba'i las //
NG0220:3257: shog bu gru bzhi cha mnyam la //
NG0220:3259: srid pa'i rus sbal lto bar bri //
NG0220:3260: dbus su gru gsum gang gnod bri //
NG0220:3261: 'khrul mig bcu drug rtsa ba'i sngags //
NG0220:3262: yang logs bcu bzhi spu gri rtsibs //
NG0220:3263: las ni sna tshogs rtsa ba gcig / zla kham me tog bsrung ba'i 'bru //
NG0220:3264: bcu bzhi bkod la skabs dang sbyar //
NG0220:3265: khrag dang dug chu tsha ba bsku //
NG0220:3266: thod pa dang bcas sbyor ba brtsam //
NG0220:3267: zhag bdun sngags bzlas drag tu bskul //
NG0220:3268: lha bsgom bka' rten 'og tu gnan //
NG0220:3269: sngags kyi rtsa ba gnyis su bya //
NG0220:3270: bcu drug bcu gnyis rno dang shis //
NG0220:3271: rig pa stobs dang brda yis sbyar //
NG0220:3272: drag sngags sbyor ba 'di lta ste //
NG0220:3273: e ka he dun yam mam ra sham dza mu na dri sham ram kring shu /
NG0220:3274: sarba du ram u nan gzer phyung sbur nan srog la myogs rbad /
NG0220:3275: drag sngags mngon du phyung ba'i rgyud las /
NG0220:3276: yan lag gi sbyor ba'i le'u ste nyi shu pa'o
NG0220:3277: // // de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis drag
NG0220:3278: sngags yongs su smin pa'i don 'di gsungs so //
NG0220:3279: e ma chos sku byang chub sems //
NG0220:3280: skye 'gag med pa'i ngo bor gnas //
NG0220:3281: ma bcos bde chen lhun gyis grub //
NG0220:3282: ye shes thig le ngang la rdzogs //
NG0220:3283: thabs kyi rgyal po rdo rje yis //
NG0220:3284: gsang ba yongs su rdzogs pa yi //
NG0220:3285: drag po sngags kyi dmod pa gdams //
NG0220:3286: kun tu bgrod pa gsum gyis sbyang *//
NG0220:3287: bde ba'i lam can gzhan las min / ye shes rig pa snang bar spyad //
NG0220:3288: rgyud kyi rgyal po mngon phyung 'di //
NG0220:3289: ma 'ongs dam ldan srung byed na //
NG0220:3290: da yang dam las mi g.yel bsrung *//
NG0220:3291: 'chi bdag dregs pa stobs can kun //
NG0220:3292: dam tshig bka' yi 'khor lo srungs //
NG0220:3293: e ma ho rig pa'i bka' rgyud 'di //
NG0220:3294: bde ba'i lam can dag pa dang *//
NG0220:3295: ma bsgribs lam la gnas pa dang *//
NG0220:3297: rig pa'i lam la zhugs pa dang *//
NG0220:3298: 'chi bdag dregs pa myos pa dang *//
NG0220:3299: 'thoms pa'i tshogs dang khrag skyugs tshogs //
NG0220:3300: phung byed mngag pa gdug pa'i tshogs //
NG0220:3301: 'khor na gnas pa'i dam can kun //
NG0220:3302: sangs rgyas bka' yi rgyud 'di zung *//
NG0220:3303: gnyis med bgrod pa'i sa la gnas //
NG0220:3304: rdo rje gtum po rdo rje'i tshogs //
NG0220:3305: rdo rje khro bo rdo rje khrag 'thung dad //
NG0220:3306: rdo rje gnod sbyin srin po dang *//
NG0220:3307: rdo rje mkha' 'gro'i tshogs rnams kyang *//
NG0220:3308: dam la gnas shing ma g.yel srungs //
NG0220:3309: sangs rgyas bka' yi yon tan brjod mi lang *//
NG0220:3310: che ba'i yon tan gsum dang gcig tu ldan //
NG0220:3311: khro bo'i snying po dregs pa ma mo drag po dang *//
NG0220:3312: bcu dang sum sgril rin chen phreng ba ltar *//
NG0220:3313: dam par sbyar la gnyen po gcig tu bsgrub //
NG0220:3314: dbang sdud phyag rgya chen po rang bzhin gzir //
NG0220:3315: nam mkha' rin chen rgya mtsho me dang 'dra //
NG0220:3316: dregs pa stobs chen phyag rgya brtan byas la //
NG0220:3317: snying po bcu gnyis rtsa ba gcig tu @#//
NG0220:3319: yan lag gang 'dod spu gri thems //
NG0220:3320: gang rung sbyar na rin chen snying po 'bru //
NG0220:3321: bstan pa gsum ldan bde ba gcig gi ngang *//
NG0220:3322: snying po bcu gnyis mi 'gyur thig le la //
NG0220:3323: bsrung ba'i rgyal po dmar len mtshon dang sbyar //
NG0220:3324: gzir ba'i snying po gang yin mtshams su 'pho //
NG0220:3325: rnam shes 'phrog pa 'bru gcig snying la bsdu //
NG0220:3326: mtshon dpag dka' na skye med nam mkha' dbrog / shes la rgyang ring sbyor ba'i tshad dang ldan //
NG0220:3327: 'bru brgyad rtsa ba gang dmigs spu grir ldan //
NG0220:3328: 'dod pa'i don bzhi snying po gcad nas dbrog / nyes la gnod byed mtshon cha rang gcod de //
NG0220:3329: man ngag ldan pas bde bar spyad na rno //
NG0220:3330: rang sems stobs ldan ye shes rig pa'i rtsal //
NG0220:3331: 'ching med grol bar thar pa'i lam mchog 'bras //
NG0220:3332: de med rang 'ching mnar med sa la rings //
NG0220:3333: thabs med spyod bral gdeng med bgrod ma thob //
NG0220:3334: rtsa ba re dang yan lag brda' mi sbyor //
NG0220:3335: sun 'byin grol med 'ching ba'i gnas las bgrod //
NG0220:3336: blo yengs che ba'i yon tan bsam mi lang *//
NG0220:3337: grol ba'i phyag rgya yang dag 'phags lam ldan //
NG0220:3338: 'di de bde dang smin par byed pa'i mchog / gu h+ya tsit+ta so ma ha /
NG0220:3339: yam bam ram lam tsa d+ha ri /
NG0220:3340: na ga de wa rak+sha ma //
NG0220:3341: ya ma ka yi bde ba'i klong *//
NG0220:3342: a dang khyab ho pu shu ta //
NG0220:3343: ye shes rig pa'i klong du brdal //
NG0220:3344: 'di dag bde ba'i lam can de //
NG0220:3345: smin cing bgrod pa'i thabs mchog rgyal //
NG0220:3346: a yi ye shes las byung ba //
NG0220:3347: skye med rnam dag chos skur gsal //
NG0220:3348: e yi ye shes las byung ba //
NG0220:3349: drag po sreg byed nam mkhar gsal //
NG0220:3350: sangs rgyas skye ba'i cho 'phrul lo //
NG0220:3351: bde ba'i lam can snying po kun las 'das //
NG0220:3352: nor bu gser ldan rin chen rgyal sa thob //
NG0220:3353: bka' yi bden pa bde ba'i ngang la bzhag / ces bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la /
NG0220:3354: 'khor rnams rjes su yi rang ste mngon par bstod do //
NG0220:3355: 'khor de dag gis bden pa mthong bar gyur to //
NG0220:3356: drag sngags mngon du phyung ba'i rgyud las /
NG0220:3357: rgyud yongs su gtad pa'i le'u ste nyi shu gcig
NG0220:3358: pa'o // // dpal gshin rje'i rgyud khri drug stong
NG0220:3359: pa nas / drag po rno dbal mtshon cha'i skabs bton pa'o //
